channel.description: Recent content in about on Seth dot cool

item.title: Welcome to the least-cool dot-cool on the Internet
item.description: I registered the seth.cool domain in 2016 with no project in mind – only the misguided assumptions that someone else would buy it, and that I’m cool. A couple years later, I decided to use my first-mover’s advantage to share data-related projects as I worked on them. At the time, data analysis was a relatively new interest of mine. While working on the customer support and renewals teams at Discovery Education, I noticed that when I wasn’t communicating with customers, I was spending the majority of my time working with pseudo-CRMs1 in Excel.
